name: vitalcare-connect
description: A modern full-stack telemedicine platform featuring real-time video consultations, AI-powered health insights, secure payment processing, appointment management, and electronic prescriptions. Built with Next.js, Node.js, and WebRTC for a seamless healthcare experience.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server" "stripe listen --forward-to localhost:8000/api/webhook"
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format --prefix client" "npm run format --prefix server"
